extendedInfo.description: FinanceSim is a personal financial planner that projects your future financial situation based on your earnings and spending.Based on your income, expenses, savings, and debts the app produces a forecasting of your cash flows, net worth, interrelation and growth of your assets and liabilities. By playing with input data you can view different scenarios of your future finances.Run simulations to get answers about:- value of your assets at retirement,- the growth of your savings with respect to expenses and debts,- monthly budget cashflows (income, interest, expenses, debt service, money saved),- when you will get out of debt,- if and when it will be possible for you to live off the interest,- will your pension give you enough money to enjoy a comfortable life,- and more.FREE! No ads! No permissions needed - absolutely private!I will be very happy to hear your feedback, suggestions and opinions at codelemma@gmail.com.

reviews.title: Well thought out app
reviews.comment: Love the Android design. The app works flawlessly. Good in thinking about the future.
reviews.author: Sylwia Maria

reviews.title: Very nice app!
reviews.comment: Smooth and clear. I was looking for something like this!
reviews.author: Tomasz Kos
